short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Netflix, HBO Max, Disney Plus, Hulu, and Aha in sync with friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch Party Supported Platforms: Netflix,  HBO Max, DisneyPlus, Hulu, Aha.

Comments Section Supported Platforms: Netflix, Aha

Experience the future of communal viewing with MoovyChat, the first-ever 'Watch Together' Chrome extension in India. Designed to transform your OTT experience on Netflix and Aha, MoovyChat introduces the unique feature of a 'MoovyNest'. This personalized viewing room lets you invite friends, sync viewing experiences, and share comments and reactions in real-time, fostering a new form of interactive entertainment. Seamlessly blending into the intuitive interfaces of your favorite platforms, MoovyChat amplifies your viewing journey without causing disruptions. Become a part of the MoovyChat revolution today and reshape how you watch and engage with your favorite content on Netflix and Aha.

Features
- MoovyNest: Watch Together.
- Spoiler comments.
- Realtime active comments.
- Video Filters.
- Ambience Borders.
- Resize the video.

What's new in v1.1.8
- Now watch party is available for HBO Max.

What's new in v1.1.6
- Added MoovyNest: Watch Together support for Hulu and DisneyPlus.
- Performance Optimization.

What's new in v1.1.1
- Added support for Aha OTT Platform.
- Added Animated Emojis (Explosive on Hover)
- Added GIFs for MoovyNest - Watch Together.
- Added Categories for Netflix. Now browse movies by categories.

What's new in v1.0.9
- Introducing MoovyNest. Now Watch Movies together with your friends on Private Nest, or watch together with Strangers on Public Nest for Netflix.

There are lot of exciting awaiting future updates available. We are constantly working to make the OTT streaming fun and interesting.
